SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE M_ADMIN_YN = 'N'

SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW_NUMBER , M_NAME , M_ID , M_NICKNAME , M_GENDER , M_BANK , M_WARNING_NO , M_BAN_STATUS , M_STATUS , M_LOGIN_TYPE FROM (SELECT M_NAME , M_ID , M_NICKNAME , M_GENDER , M_BANK , M_WARNING_NO , M_BAN_STATUS , M_STATUS , M_LOGIN_TYPE FROM MEMBER WHERE M_ADMIN_YN = 'N' ORDER BY M_ENROLL_DATE DESC)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE M_ADMIN_YN = 'N' AND (#{value} IS NULL OR M_ID = #{value} )

SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW_NUMBER , M_NAME , M_ID , M_NICKNAME , M_GENDER , M_BANK , M_WARNING_NO , M_BAN_STATUS , M_STATUS , M_LOGIN_TYPE FROM (SELECT M_NAME , M_ID , M_NICKNAME , M_GENDER , M_BANK , M_WARNING_NO , M_BAN_STATUS , M_STATUS , M_LOGIN_TYPE FROM MEMBER WHERE M_ADMIN_YN = 'N' AND (#{value} IS NULL OR M_ID = #{value} ) ORDER BY M_ENROLL_DATE DESC)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER JOIN MEMBERBAN ON (M_UNO = MB_UNO) WHERE M_ADMIN_YN = 'N' AND M_BAN_STATUS = 'Y' AND M_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW_NUMBER , M_ID , M_NICKNAME , M_WARNING_NO , MB_REASON , TO_CHAR(MB_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MB_START_DATE , TO_CHAR(MB_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MB_END_DATE FROM (SELECT M_ID , M_NICKNAME , M_WARNING_NO , MB_REASON , MB_START_DATE , MB_END_DATE FROM MEMBER JOIN MEMBERBAN ON (M_UNO = MB_UNO) WHERE M_ADMIN_YN = 'N' AND M_BAN_STATUS = 'Y' AND M_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY MB_START_DATE DESC)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER JOIN MEMBERBAN ON (M_UNO = MB_UNO) WHERE M_ADMIN_YN = 'N' AND M_BAN_STATUS = 'Y' AND M_STATUS = 'Y' AND (#{value} IS NULL OR M_ID = #{value} )

SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW_NUMBER , M_ID , M_NICKNAME , M_WARNING_NO , MB_REASON , TO_CHAR(MB_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MB_START_DATE , TO_CHAR(MB_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MB_END_DATE FROM (SELECT M_ID , M_NICKNAME , M_WARNING_NO , MB_REASON , MB_START_DATE , MB_END_DATE FROM MEMBER JOIN MEMBERBAN ON (M_UNO = MB_UNO) WHERE M_ADMIN_YN = 'N' AND M_BAN_STATUS = 'Y' AND M_STATUS = 'Y' AND (#{value} IS NULL OR M_ID = #{value} ) ORDER BY MB_START_DATE DESC)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE M_ADMIN_YN = 'N' AND M_STATUS = 'N'

SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW_NUMBER , M_NAME , M_ID , M_NICKNAME , M_REASON , TO_CHAR(M_LEAVE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS M_LEAVE_DATE FROM (SELECT M_NAME , M_ID , M_NICKNAME , M_REASON , M_LEAVE_DATE FROM MEMBER WHERE M_ADMIN_YN = 'N' AND M_STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY M_LEAVE_DATE DESC)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE M_ADMIN_YN = 'N' AND M_STATUS = 'N' AND (#{value} IS NULL OR M_ID = #{value} )

SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW_NUMBER , M_NAME , M_ID , M_NICKNAME , M_REASON , TO_CHAR(M_LEAVE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS M_LEAVE_DATE FROM (SELECT M_NAME , M_ID , M_NICKNAME , M_REASON , M_LEAVE_DATE FROM MEMBER WHERE M_ADMIN_YN = 'N' AND M_STATUS = 'N' AND (#{value} IS NULL OR M_ID = #{value} ) ORDER BY M_LEAVE_DATE DESC)
